Text.Page:
Oh, Adru's more fun than an Orcan on fire.

But he's rightâ€”there's {@LinkCreature:15#14#something toothy} out there...slithered into camp and took a bite out of Tetrask.

Takes a lot to shake me, but they moved...wrong.

I'm all there is between those things and scholar stew! Care to dissuade them a bit?
Nice job. You're almost good enough to be a member of the kingdom guard. Keep up the good work!
Did you kill those {@LinkCreature:15#14#toothy, slithery things}?
